item.title: Daddy Yankee - Con Calma
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: Am G Dm
Con Calma by Daddy Yankee & Snow. It’s been raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - Señorita
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: Am, Cmaj7, F, Em, G
As performed by Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/-ADxekOsPqA
Want the intro TAB in PDF format? Visit: https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/2019/06/22/tab-for-senorita/
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com. The "clean" version of the song (use in schools may still not be appropriate) is from Polar Records (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FjC5XHyK7hE)
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Prince Royce - Darte un Beso
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Darte Un Beso on the ukulele by Prince Royce. The chords used are F C Bb Dm G Gm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Luis Fonsi - Llegaste Tú
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Llegaste Tu on the ukulele by Luis Fonsi and Juan Luis Guerra. The chords used are C F G Am Dm Em F#dim.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Los Del Rio - Macarena
item.description:
For educational use. Only 1 Chord Used: G
For a "not-so-simplified" version of this ukulele play along, click here: https://youtu.be/y03Bp1W0tDs.
La Macarena by Los Del Rio. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Original Just Dance Unlimited Video: http://youtube.com/watch?v=Nt-0yK9gPv4

item.title: Los Del Rio - Macarena
item.description:
For educational use. For a SIMPLIFIED 1 chord version, click here: https://youtu.be/ET7NTSOmUWw .
Chords Used: G F
La Macarena by Los Del Rio. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Original Just Dance Unlimited Video: http://youtube.com/watch?v=Nt-0yK9gPv4

item.title: Leo Bambo - Bamboleo
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Bamboleo on the ukulele by The Gypsy Kings. The chords used are Em C D7 Bb Gmaj7 Am Am7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Anitta - Ugly [Spanish Version]
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Ugly (Fea -Spanish version) on the ukulele by Anitta from the movie UglyDolls. The chords used are G C Em.
I made 3 versions of this play-along G - English - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FWwW-A63xFA G - English Simplified - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=19_GycBOboU G - Spanish - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=irFE_xOIBG4
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos

item.title: Los Panchos - Bésame Mucho
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Besame Mucho on the ukulele by Los Panchos. The chords used are Em Am E7 B A D C7 G G+ E6.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Pedro Capó - Calma
item.description:
Acá les dejo CALMA de Pedro Capó, para que puedan tocarlo con sus Ukeleles!!
Deja en los comentarios que canción querés para el próximo video!
